ingredients.item: Piloncillo (Mexican-style unrefined brown sugar), grated (or 1 cup packed dark brown sugar)
Tart apples, peeled, cored, finely chopped
Ripe pear, peeled, cored, finely chopped
cup Packed raisins or golden raisins
cup Dried hibiscus flowers (also known as jamaica or sorrel), tied inside a square of cheesecloth
